name: Don't Get Fired Simulator
description:
Don't get fired simulator is a fun platform game , with three game modes

Follow is a game mode where you have to guide co workers through the work place and try and take them to your boss with out getting them injured ! if they get injured you get fired.

In The Bin is a game mode where you have to throw rubbish into a bin and score points and if you miss you can get fired!

Lost and Found you have to go and find some items which are around the work place, try not to break anything!
